decision_conditions: The proposed front porch's design, scale, and appearance would not appear subordinate and sympathetic to the dwelling and neighbouring properties. The incongruous extension would be out of keeping with the prevailing development pattern to the detriment of the subject dwelling's appearance, the street scene's visual amenity, and the area's character. The proposal is contrary to Policies D3 and D6 of The London Plan and Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12, and DMHD 1 of the London Borough of Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 Development Management Policies (2020).

The proposed hardstanding car parking would result in the overprovision of car parking, contrary to Policies T4 and T6.1 of The London Plan (2021) and Policies DMT 1, DMT 2, and DMT 6 of the London Borough of Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 Development Management Policies (2020).
description: Erection of a front porch, single-storey rear extension, conversion of roof space to habitable use to include a rear dormer and front roof lights with installation/amendments to fenestration. Alterations to front garden to include two car parking spaces and a boundary fence (amended description).
